content: The Minnesota Republican party’s willingness to flippantly refer to this as ‘racism’ both disrespects & minimizes every human being who has ever personally experienced or fought against racism or discrimination. Combine this with Republican Sean Spicer’s outrageously insensitive statement completely disregarding the Holocaust & the deaths of those victimized by it gives us a full picture of exactly what today’s GOP stands for. That is the Republican Party is willing to co-opt the pain & suffering of ANY group in a petty attempt to gain sympathy for their poor immoral behavior.
